data.title: Cranhill Beacon â€” Glasgow Life
data.text:
Baby changing

Baby feeding

Parking

There is a small car park offering free off-street parking to the front of the venue. There is also free on-street parking available in the immediate area.

Photography and video recording

At times, Glasgow Life will be on the premises to film and take photographs.

Free wifi

Cranhill Community Centre is a perfect venue for meetings and small conferences, classes and clubs, all at very competitive rates.

Wondering if Cranhill Community Centre is ideal for your event? Check out this information to find out. If you've got an idea you'd like to discuss, please get in touch.

Rooms for hire

Meeting Room (Capacity 6)

The Kerr Suite (Capacity 30)

Multi Purpose Room (Capacity 32)

Main Hall (Capacity 200)

Dance Studio (Capacity 30)

Please note that all rooms are wheelchair accessible.

Minimum Let duration is 1 hour. Lets for part of an hour will be charged at the hourly rate.

There is no kitchen or catering service available for use at Cranhill Beacon.

For booking enquiries, please call us on 0141 276 1591.

See the 2024/2025 Price List & Booking Form for room hire.
